text: <@U25PYL3Q8> thanks I used that but it seemed to apply the grey to the entire body of the email versus just section by section. Any insight on how to apply it by sections similar to the screenshot?

Hello HubSpotters! I wanted to create a directory landing page for videos and Webinars and categorize them based on tags as well. I am able to get the pagination and number of total webinars dynamically. However, when I click on the tag category, I am unable to bring the pagination for that particular tag and the total count of videos/webinars under that particular tag.  Do someone has done this or have a solution or approach for me? Thank you in advance for your help.

Would also like to know what is the right way to build a directory landing page for videos in HubSpot CMS.

For building something like this, you could either do it via HubDB or repurpose the blogging engine for this. With option 2 (using the blog) you can use the normal topics from the blog that way. Seems like an easier approach to what you may be looking to accomplish.
BTW, the missing module issue should be fixed by out next release, sometime today.
ok. I just replaced the module with a new one. Work around.
Has anyone used Google's API to pre-populate an HS address form field?
